segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 46
segments.en: Linked Discourses 46

segments.pli: 1. Pabbatavagga
segments.en: 1. Mountains

segments.pli: 4. Vatthasutta
segments.en: 4. Clothes

segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā sāriputto sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
segments.en: At one time Venerable Sāriputta was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.

segments.pli: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
segments.en: There Sāriputta addressed the mendicants:

segments.pli: “āvuso bhikkhavo”ti.
segments.en: “Reverends, mendicants!”

segments.pli: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
segments.en: “Reverend,” they replied.

segments.pli: Āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca:
segments.en: Sāriputta said this:

segments.pli: “Sattime, āvuso, bojjhaṅgā.
segments.en: “There are these seven awakening factors.

segments.pli: Katame satta?
segments.en: What seven?

segments.pli: Satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—
segments.en: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.

segments.pli: ime kho, āvuso, satta bojjhaṅgā.
segments.en: These are the seven awakening factors.

segments.pli: Imesaṃ khvāhaṃ, āvuso, sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi pubbaṇhasamayaṃ viharituṃ, tena tena bojjhaṅgena pubbaṇhasamayaṃ viharāmi;
segments.en: In the morning, I meditate on whichever of these seven awakening factors I want.

segments.pli: yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi majjhanhikaṃ samayaṃ viharituṃ, tena tena bojjhaṅgena majjhanhikaṃ samayaṃ viharāmi;
segments.en: At midday,

segments.pli: yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi sāyanhasamayaṃ viharituṃ, tena tena bojjhaṅgena sāyanhasamayaṃ viharāmi.
segments.en: and in the evening, I meditate on whichever of these seven awakening factors I want.

segments.pli: Satisambojjhaṅgo iti ce me, āvuso, hoti, ‘appamāṇo’ti me hoti, ‘susamāraddho’ti me hoti, tiṭṭhantañca naṃ ‘tiṭṭhatī’ti pajānāmi.
segments.en: If it’s the awakening factor of mindfulness, I know that it’s limitless and that it’s properly implemented. While it remains I understand that it remains.

segments.pli: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccayā me cavatī’ti pajānāmi … pe …
segments.en: And if it subsides I understand that it subsides. …

segments.pli: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo iti ce me, āvuso, hoti, ‘appamāṇo’ti me hoti, ‘susamāraddho’ti me hoti, tiṭṭhantañca naṃ ‘tiṭṭhatī’ti pajānāmi.
segments.en: If it’s the awakening factor of equanimity, I know that it’s limitless and that it’s properly implemented. While it remains I understand that it remains.

segments.pli: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccayā me cavatī’ti pajānāmi.
segments.en: And if it subsides I understand that it subsides.

segments.pli: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā nānārattānaṃ dussānaṃ dussakaraṇḍako pūro assa.
segments.en: Suppose that a ruler or their minister had a chest full of garments of different colors.

segments.pli: So yaññadeva dussayugaṃ ākaṅkheyya pubbaṇhasamayaṃ pārupituṃ, taṃ tadeva dussayugaṃ pubbaṇhasamayaṃ pārupeyya;
segments.en: In the morning, they’d don whatever pair of garments they wanted.

segments.pli: yaññadeva dussayugaṃ ākaṅkheyya majjhanhikaṃ samayaṃ pārupituṃ, taṃ tadeva dussayugaṃ majjhanhikaṃ samayaṃ pārupeyya;
segments.en: At midday,

segments.pli: yaññadeva dussayugaṃ ākaṅkheyya sāyanhasamayaṃ pārupituṃ, taṃ tadeva dussayugaṃ sāyanhasamayaṃ pārupeyya.
segments.en: and in the evening, they’d don whatever pair of garments they wanted.

segments.pli: Evameva khvāhaṃ, āvuso, imesaṃ sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi pubbaṇhasamayaṃ viharituṃ, tena tena bojjhaṅgena pubbaṇhasamayaṃ viharāmi;
segments.en: In the same way, in the morning,

segments.pli: yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi majjhanhikaṃ samayaṃ viharituṃ, tena tena bojjhaṅgena majjhanhikaṃ samayaṃ viharāmi;
segments.en: at midday,

segments.pli: yena yena bojjhaṅgena ākaṅkhāmi sāyanhasamayaṃ viharituṃ, tena tena bojjhaṅgena sāyanhasamayaṃ viharāmi.
segments.en: and in the evening, I meditate on whichever of these seven awakening factors I want.

segments.pli: Satisambojjhaṅgo iti ce me, āvuso, hoti, ‘appamāṇo’ti me hoti, ‘susamāraddho’ti me hoti, tiṭṭhantañca naṃ ‘tiṭṭhatī’ti pajānāmi.
segments.en: If it’s the awakening factor of mindfulness, I know that it’s limitless and that it’s properly implemented. While it remains I understand that it remains.

segments.pli: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccayā me cavatī’ti pajānāmi … pe …
segments.en: And if it subsides I understand that it subsides. …

segments.pli: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo iti ce me, āvuso, hoti, ‘appamāṇo’ti me hoti, ‘susamāraddho’ti me hoti, tiṭṭhantañca naṃ ‘tiṭṭhatī’ti pajānāmi.
segments.en: If it’s the awakening factor of equanimity, I know that it’s limitless and that it’s properly implemented. While it remains I understand that it remains.

segments.pli: Sacepi me cavati, ‘idappaccayā me cavatī’ti pajānāmī”ti.
segments.en: And if it subsides I understand that it subsides.”

segments.pli: Catutthaṃ.

sections.title: At one time Venerable Sāriputta was staying near Sāvatthī…

suttaplex.blurb: The various awakening factors can be donned at different times of the day, like a man who puts on bright colored clothes whenever he wants.
